definitions.definition: A member of any of the African ethnic groups that speak a Bantu language.
The largest African language family of the Niger-Congo group, spoken in much of Sub-Saharan Africa.

main_definition: ( countable ) A member of any of the African ethnic groups that speak a Bantu language.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The largest African language family of the Niger-Congo group, spoken in much of Sub-Saharan Africa.
